QuestData.Title: Brain Food
QuestData.Description: Kovok is growing at an accelerated rate, but his brain may not be able to keep up. He'll require a special diet to ensure that he does not outgrow the capacity to control his own body.$B$BMushan tongue is rich in the nutrients that promote brain growth in kunchong, but they normally eat the beasts whole and fill up quickly. If we feed Kovok only mushan tongues every couple of days or so, it should balance out his growth.$B$BGreatback mushan graze the hills east of here, near the Gurthani Terrace.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 4 Mushan Tongues to Kaz'tik the Manipulator at Klaxxi'vess.
